content.text: Not much, I'm just relaxing before I go to bed.
Me too, I'm watching Star Trek: The Next Generation.
Oh, that's a great show! I love Star Trek.
Me too! What's your favorite episode?
I don't know, there are so many good ones. I guess I'd have to say "The Inner Light".
That's a great episode! I love the part where Picard learns about the culture of the people he's been sent to help.
Me too! That's one of the things I love about Star Trek, it's so thought-provoking.
Yeah, it really makes you think about the meaning of life and stuff.
Exactly! It's so much more than just a sci-fi show.
Yeah, it's a work of art.
Well, I should probably get to bed. It was nice talking to you!
